contributionDescription: Work that provided impact to end users in the Optimism Collective, or helped bring new end users into the Collective. Testing new features and spreading the word. I like to help badgeholders understand there impact in the ecosystem and give them advise how to benefit from those.
impactDescription: Whit the knowledge that i had that time in hope they make the right decisions.  Provided impact to end users in the Optimism Collective was no easy task , or helping new end users into the Collective. i will still spreading the hype and my knowledge.
pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Ecosystem, End User Experience and Adoption
